scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:cucumber
scripts.kill-ports: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const puertos = [3000, 3001]; const obtenerPids = (linea) => { const partes = linea.trim().split(/\s+/); return partes[partes.length - 1]; }; puertos.forEach((puerto) => { try { const salida = execSync('netstat -ano | findstr :' + puerto, { encoding: 'utf8' }); const lineas = salida.split(/\r?\n/).filter(Boolean); const pids = [...new Set(lineas.map(obtenerPids).filter(Boolean))]; if (pids.length === 0) { console.log('Puerto', puerto, 'libre'); return; } pids.forEach((pid) => { try { execSync('taskkill /PID ' + pid + ' /F'); console.log('Finalizado PID', pid, 'en puerto', puerto); } catch (error) { console.error('No se pudo terminar PID', pid, 'en puerto', puerto, '-', error.message); } }); } catch { console.log('Puerto', puerto, 'libre'); } });"

author: 4K2-G11-2025-LaChangada
